name: Build a School

name: CHANCE SQUARE
description:
A business the centre had supported has unfortunately gone bust.
Lose 150,000 ZAR and 15 people

name: CHANCE SQUARE
description:
To boost your help in the community, the local council has donated for your efforts.
Gain 150,000 ZAR

name: CHANCE SQUARE
description:
The government continues to support Maker's Centre and donates to stengthen its financial capabilities.
Gain 250,000 ZAR

name: CHANCE SQUARE
description:
Several participants stopped coming to Maker's Centre.

name: CHANCE SQUARE
description:
From international donators online, the centre has amassed a substantial portion to continue community aid
Gain 750,000 ZAR
